titles.title: A bill to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to expand the types of one-stop centers used to provide services.
A bill to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to expand the types of one-stop centers used to provide services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
